settings.Main_Heading: Helping Customers Along Their Microbiome Journey
settings.bottomtext: The testimonials for our products are happily provided by satisfied Sun Genomics customers and have all been verified by a member of our team.

settings.faqs_heading: What is the microbiome?
settings.paragraph: The microbiome is the collection of all the microbes and their corresponding set of genes. Sun Genomics focuses on the microbiome located in the gut. A common misconception is that all these microbes are bad for you, but that is not true; microbes play an integral role in aiding the body's immunological, nutritional, and metabolic functions.

settings.faqs_heading: How does Floré help my microbiome?
settings.paragraph: Part of Sun Genomics' process is to analyze your gut composition and record which microbes your body has both ample and deficient supply of. Based on the data, we will craft a probiotic that will help fortify your gut into a stronger and healthier state.

settings.faqs_heading: When can I expect to see results?
settings.paragraph: It's important to note that every person is different in both their gut profile as well as their reaction to probiotics. Therefore everyone's results and reaction time is a variable that we cannot predict. What we can predict is that your overall health will improve.

settings.faqs_heading: Does my gut microbiome change?
settings.paragraph: Your microbiome is always subject to change: if you take antibiotics, have a severe illness, or even change your diet, your gut microbiome will change. We provide you probiotics that last for three months and you can renew your subscription to re-test and reformulate, accommodating for any changes to your microbiome.

settings.faqs_heading: What does my subscription entail?
settings.paragraph: As a part of the subscription, we include one kit, which will be used to collect your stool sample, and three months worth of personalized probiotics. If you wish to continue your subscription there will be an automatic renewal option, wherein after your probiotics have ended, you will be retested and provided with a new set of probiotics.

settings.faqs_heading: Will I have to take it to the rest of my life?
settings.paragraph: All customers are different in how they plan to manage their microbiome. After three months we encourage customers to retest and see how their microbiome has changed.

settings.faqs_heading: How often do I get to test my microbiome in the first 4 months?
settings.paragraph: Your Floré subscription includes 1 microbiome test every four months.

settings.faqs_heading: What is included in my purchase of Floré Test + Probiotics
settings.paragraph: The Floré Test + Probiotics includes an easy-to-use at-home microbiome collection kit, an in-depth microbiome analysis for month 1 and a monthly supply of lab-crafted probiotics manufactured in our GMP facility in San Diego, California starting month 2 and onward.

settings.faqs_heading: How much do the following rounds of Floré cost after the initial round?
settings.paragraph: The renewal rate is the same low price of $99 + taxes with free shipping and you’ll receive the test kit in month 1 and custom formulated batch of probiotics monthly.

settings.faqs_heading: How long will it usually take for me to receive my customized probiotics supplement from the day I send back my sample?
settings.paragraph: It currently takes between 3-5 weeks from the day we receive your sample to the day we ship your probiotics and you receive your Microbiome Analysis Report in the online customer portal.

settings.faqs_heading: Isn’t 16 weeks too early to see a difference in my Microbiome to retest?
settings.paragraph: Not at all. We’ve tested quite a lot of people and found that we could see significant microbiome shifts in only 3 weeks of taking Floré precision probiotics.

settings.faqs_heading: What if I just want more of my initial formulation instead of a retest?
settings.paragraph: You may stay on your initial formulation for $99 + taxes at month 5 and not opt to gut test, but we will send you one to complete whenever you are ready.

settings.faqs_heading: How often will I be charged and how often I will get my supplies?
settings.paragraph: Floré is a monthly subscription. You can manage your subscription through recharge. You will receive the information via email. You will receive a new test kit every three months along with three months custom formulated probiotics.

settings.faqs_heading: Where are my probiotics made?
settings.paragraph: Everything we do is in-house. Every step of the process from formulation to fulfillment is done at our headquarters in San Diego, California.

settings.faqs_heading: When will I receive my probiotics?
settings.paragraph: At Sun Genomics, we use cutting edge sequencing technology to analyze your gut microbiome and micro-manufacture each probiotic pill in our facility. Good science and personalization takes some time as every piece is reviewed by our team of scientists. Currently, customers should expect to receive their precision probiotics within 3-5 weeks.

settings.faqs_heading: How important is refrigeration during travel if I want to take my probiotics with me?
settings.paragraph: We have run rigorous testing in house to understand the viability of the strains in each of our probiotics under specific temperature conditions and believe that your probiotics have not been impacted by the temperature change. Most probiotic strains can endure temperatures up to 112F and all are happy at body temperature of 98F. Our probiotics are cold shipped to ensure survivability and the bamboo travel jar included in your purpose protects the probiotics for up to 30 days at room temperature.

settings.faqs_heading: After first 4 months, do you collect another sample before preparing next shipment of probiotics?
settings.paragraph: At Sun Genomics, we truly believe in the value of re-testing over a period of time to understand the changes to your microbiome which will allow us to reformulate as your microbiome changes. When the subscription is at month 5 we will ship a re-test kit with your supply of precision probiotics.  The sooner you return it, the sooner we can show you how your gut has improved and get the new formulation shipped out to you.

settings.faqs_heading: How do I manage my subscription?
settings.paragraph:
Here's how to manage your subscription in account services:
1) Billing & Accounts: Visit the account page
2) Log in using the email address used to purchase Floré
3) If you cannot login, you may need to create an account first using the email you used to purchase Floré: Visit the registration page
4) Click on “Manage Subscriptions” on the left of the screen

settings.faqs_heading: What microbes can you detect with your sequencing test?
settings.paragraph: Using whole genome sequencing, we are able to detect any microbe as well as its relative abundance. This includes bacteria, viruses, yeast, fungus, archaea, and parasites.

settings.faqs_heading: What is the microbiome?
settings.paragraph: The microbiome is the collection of all the microbes and their corresponding set of genes. Sun Genomics focuses on the microbiome located in the gut. A common misconception is that all these microbes are bad for you, but that is not true; microbes play an integral role in aiding the body's immunological, nutritional, and metabolic functions.

settings.faqs_heading: What can your test detect?
settings.paragraph:
• Our microbiome platform (Gutbuster) can detect over 23,000 different organisms including bacteria, parasites, yeast, viruses, phases, and fungi.
  • Some common organisms that our platform can detect include: Candida, H. pylori, Blastocystis hominis, and E-coli.
  • To keep things simple, our microbiome report only highlights organisms that have a .02% abundance level or higher meaning that if you were looking for a specific organism on the report and can't find it, it is likely that the organism was not detected at a high enough level (over .02% abundance).
  • We cannot detect any human DNA, so we can't detect blood in the stool. This means we are not capturing your DNA itself, only the DNA of the microbes living in your gut.

settings.faqs_heading: What’s the difference between the two tests you offer?
settings.paragraph: The tests are the same. We just give you a discount and make the test $99 when purchasing the monthly subscription. Month 2 of the monthly subscription starts the custom probiotics.

settings.faqs_heading: How often should I retest?
settings.paragraph: Monthly subscribers retest for free every 4 months on the probiotics. It is optional to return the test, but we highly recommend it so we can update your formula with your changing microbiome. Diet, antibiotics, our custom probiotics, and more can change the microbiome.

settings.faqs_heading: How do I read my report?
settings.paragraph:
• The Microbiome Analysis is very thorough. We suggest taking the time to digest the information by first reading the summary information provided on the home dashboard. On the home dashboard, you can also find information about your microbiome as it compares with a reference dataset from the American Gut Project as well as a score (how healthy is your microbiome).
  • From there, you can work through the individual tabs breaking down subsections of your gut microbiome starting with the Top Ten (top ten microbes by abundance), Probiotic Profile, Harmful Microbes etc. Each of the microbes includes a brief description and comparison information so that you can gauge how you stack up with other Floré customers.
  • If you are using the Floré Mobile Application, some of the more common microbes include brief videos about certain microbes. These "Microbe Moments" can also be found on our YouTube channel.
  • Want help reviewing it? You can schedule a free call to review your results with our Scientific Liaison.
  • With your kit, you will receive an instructions booklet for how to take the at-home stool collection. A pre-paid mailer is also included for easy return of your sample! For more detailed instructions on how to collect the sample, watch the collection video in our Collection Instructions page.

settings.faqs_heading: How does Floré help my microbiome?
settings.paragraph: Part of Sun Genomics' process is to analyze your gut composition and record which microbes your body has both ample and deficient supply of. Based on the data, we will craft a probiotic that will help fortify your gut into a stronger and healthier state.

settings.faqs_heading: How do I take the probiotics?
settings.paragraph:
• Capsules (Floré): The probiotics can be taken anytime, but we suggest taking one probiotic pill every day in the morning, at least 20 minutes before breakfast. Taking with water is best.
  • Powder (Floré Baby, Tots, & Kids): Mix one 1/4 teaspoon serving (using the scoop provided) into your child's favorite cold drink. We suggest using water, milk or juice. The probiotics can be taken anytime, but it is best to take it in the morning about 20-30 minutes before breakfast.
  • In the first shipment, everyone receives a personalized bamboo bottle and a week's worth of a prime version that is 1/6th the strength. Take this for the first seven days to get your body acclimated before beginning your first full-strength dose. (Note: the color may vary between the Prime and full-strength due to the different concentrations.)

settings.faqs_heading: When can I expect to see results?
settings.paragraph: It's important to note that every person is different in both their gut profile as well as their reaction to probiotics. Therefore, everyone's results and reaction time is a variable that we cannot predict. What we can predict is that your overall health will improve.

settings.faqs_heading: Will I have to take it to the rest of my life?
settings.paragraph: All customers are different in how they plan to manage their microbiome. After 4 months, we encourage customers to retest and see how their microbiome has changed.

settings.faqs_heading: What forms do the probiotics come in?
settings.paragraph: We offer capsules and powder form. Capsules are ideal for adults and older children who can swallow pills since they are enterically coated to survive the stomach acid. Powder is mixed with a liquid or soft food and is reserved for infants/children and adults who can not swallow capsules.

settings.faqs_heading: Where are my probiotics made?
settings.paragraph: Everything we do is in-house. Every step of the process from formulation to fulfillment is done at our headquarters in San Diego, California.

settings.faqs_heading: What about if my probiotics are warm when they arrive?
settings.paragraph: It is not uncommon for the package to arrive warm or even hot. The included ice pack is intended to prevent extreme temperature spiking while in transit. Your probiotics are not impacted by this temperature change. Most probiotic strains can endure temperatures up to 112F and all are happy at body temperature of 98F. Our probiotics are alive when shipped so as long as they aren't left out for more than 30 days, their viability is maintained. We recommend refrigeration upon arrival as they are good for up to 1 year that way.

settings.faqs_heading: How important is refrigeration during travel if I want to take my probiotics with me?
settings.paragraph: We have run rigorous testing in house to understand the viability of the strains in each of our probiotics under specific temperature conditions. Most probiotic strains can endure temperatures up to 112F and all are happy at body temperature of 98F. Our probiotics are cold shipped to ensure survivability and prevent temperature spikes in transit. The bamboo travel jar included in your first month protects the probiotics for up to 30 days at room temperature.

settings.faqs_heading: What do I do if the probiotics aren’t working for me?
settings.paragraph: If you’ve been taking the custom probiotics and feel they are not working well for you, please reach out to customerservice@sungenomics.com within the first month so we can discuss a possible reformulation.

settings.faqs_heading: How does the monthly subscription work?
How do I manage my subscription?
settings.paragraph:
You can manage your subscription (including pushing out your next renewal or canceling) by following the account management link on our website or by clicking here.
  • Log into your account using your email and password. If this is your first time trying to manage your account, you will need to create a new account.
  • After logging into your account, click on “Manage Subscriptions” which can be found on the left of the screen.
  • Once you click the Manage Subscription link, a toolbar will open that will allow you to toggle between subscriptions, upcoming orders, purchase history, shipping addresses, and billing information.
  • Click "Subscriptions" to identify your active and inactive subscriptions.
  • Select a specific subscription to cancel, skip, or reactivate your subscription.
  • Please note that the account management log-in is different from the log-in information you may have used to create an account on the Floré mobile app or on our web portal and you may need to create this account to manage your subscription.
  • Additionally, monthly subscriptions may be classified as a few different product types within one subscription which may be a bit confusing. Rest assured you will not be charged for these items that are indicated as $0.

settings.faqs_heading: How do I apply a discount code to my subscription?
settings.paragraph: To apply a discount code to your subscription, login to Account Management and choose "Subscriptions" from the toolbar along the top. Scroll down to the bottom and hit "Discount." Appy a code or change a code there.

settings.faqs_heading: How do I manage my rewards (microbes)?
settings.paragraph: You can view your number of rewards points (microbes) when logged into the Account Management page. Click on "Earn Rewards" at the upper right-hand corner of the website and a pop up will appear for all the rewards program info and your status. You can redeem your rewards there. To apply a discount code to your subscription, choose "Subscriptions" from the toolbar along the top when logged in at Account Management. Scroll down to the bottom and hit "Discount." Appy a code or change a code there. Let us know if you have any trouble with this and we can assist in applying the code on our end.

settings.heading: REGISTER
settings.description:
Download the Floré app or login
to portal.sungenomics.com
to register your kit using your kit ID.
WE CANNOT PROCESS YOUR SAMPLE UNTIL YOU REGISTER

settings.heading: PREPARE
settings.description:
1. Put on gloves. Lift your toilet cover and seat.
  2. Unfold collector pad, peel away tape, adhere to toilet allowing for a little slack.
  3. Place toilet seat down. Begin bowel movement, taking care not to wet collector.

settings.heading: COLLECT
settings.description:
1. Unfold wand and collect even stool sample across foam pad by swiping across the suace of the sample. DO NOT SCOOP
  2. Fold tip of wand down so the stool sample touches paper suace.
  3. While holding down wand, slide blue tray into white case.

settings.heading: COLLECT
settings.description:
1. Open the empty tube, collect sizable amount of sample onto the breakable swab by swiping across the suace of the sample. DO NOT SCOOP
  2. Place tip of swab into test tube and line peoration up to the edge of the tube. Carefully snap the end of the swab o. Seal the tube tightly. Repeat step a and b with the liquid filled tube.
  3. Drop soiled collector pad into water, let sit for 5 minutes, then flush.

settings.heading: RETURN
settings.description:
1. Place the wand and both tubes into the white pouch and seal. Ensure tube lids are closed tight to avoid leaks in transit.
  2. Place the white pouch in prepaid mailer and drop o at FedEx location.
  3. Once we receive your sample, we will notify you via email.
Remember to register your kit (even if this isn’t your first kit).

settings.faqs-heading: I am currently taking antibiotics, when should I test?
settings.faqs-description: Please wait 3-5 days aer completing your antibiotics.

settings.faqs-heading: Should I stop taking my current medications, supplements, and/or probiotics before providing a sample?
settings.faqs-description:
You do not need to change your current routine. In fact, we prefer to
analyze your gut in real time. Just remember to not consume alcohol
for 24 hours before testing and wait to test if you are currently taking
antibiotics.

settings.faqs-heading: How much sample should I provide?
settings.faqs-description:
The blue and white Easi-Collect should have about a quaer sized
sample on the foam wand which will transfer to the pink card once
the wand is closed. For the tube, more sample is beer. If the tube
contains a liquid preservative, be careful not to spill the liquid. That
liquid solution is critical to preserve the stool sample.

settings.faqs-heading: What should I do if I make a mistake during collection?
settings.faqs-description:
No worries! Email customerservice@sungenomics.com or call us at
(661) 888-4799 and we will ship you a replacement right away, free
of charge.

settings.faqs-heading: I’ve collected my sample. Now what?
settings.faqs-description:
Please let the Easi-Collect with your collected sample rest at room
temperature for 5 minutes before placing it in the white multibarrier
pouch. The desiccant should remain in the pouch as you seal it.
These measures help dry and beer preserve the sample

settings.faqs-heading: How do I return my sample?
settings.faqs-description: Drop o your sample using the included pre-paid mailer at a FedEx drop o location, a FedEx drop box, or a FedEx authorized shipper. DO NOT use USPS or UPS. Or

settings.faqs-heading: Do I need to refrigerate or freeze my sample before mailing?
settings.faqs-description:
If you are unable to mail your sample within 24 hours, seal it and
place it in your refrigerator until you are able to send it via FedEx.

settings.faqs-heading: How long is my sample good for in transit?
settings.faqs-description: Your sample is good for 1 week in transit.

settings.faqs-heading: Have more questions regarding the collection process?
settings.faqs-description:
Watch the video directions at www.flore.com/instructions or
reach out to us and we will be happy to answer any questions!

settings.paragraph-1: Floré micro-manufacturers each formula down to specific CFU content. Floré goes well beyond categories and survey based "solutions", by carefully formulating from a repository of 100+ prebiotic, probiotics, and botanical ingredients.
settings.paragraph-2: Want specific strains in your formula?
settings.paragraph-3: We're committed to making sure you get the formulation that's right for your unique gut. We offer a free reformulation within the first 6 weeks of starting a formula if the formula is making you feel worse, or no improvement is visible. If the reformulation still doesn't work, we can work with you to retest and do a new formula from new test results.

settings.heading: Your purchase contributes to the research
settings.sub-heading: The Gut Microbiome and Autism Spectrum Disorder
settings.paragraph: At Sun Genomics, we are committed to advancing microbiome science. In partnership with the world renowned Arizona State University Autism and Asperger's Research Program, Sun Genomics has launched a new academic collaboration focused on understanding the potential link between the gut microbiome and the Autism Spectrum Disorder. The study, Assessment of Effect of Customized Probiotic Therapy for Children and Adults with Autism, is offered to any and all individuals diagnosed with ASD.

settings.text: We Believe in Giving Back
settings.text2: We are delighted to provide a portion of our proceeds to the Crohn's & Colitis Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to finding cures for Crohn's & Colitis and improving the quality of those living with these diseases. To learn more about the Crohn's & Colitis Foundation, please visit their website:

settings.heading: Our Story
settings.paragraph:
Sun Genomics was founded by CEO, Sunny Jain in 2016 and the Company's story began with the birth of his son. When his son began suffering from GI distress, Sunny went to find a probiotic. Standing in front of the probiotic aisle i.e. the "Wall of Confusion", Sunny quickly realized there wasn't a probiotic solution available. This is because his son's gut e.g. microflora is unique. Instead of choosing a supplement at random, Sunny took tons of probiotics off the shelf that day and instead of going home, he went to the lab and began testing probiotics, sequencing his son's microflora, and researching strains that best matched his son's microflora analysis. Through testing his son’s gut, he formulated the world’s first custom probiotic for his son’s diet and lifestyle. This is our story.

Founded on Science

Sun Genomics aims to change they way we choose a probiotic by making the best custom formulated probiotics. We spent years in research and development perfecting our patented techniques to develop the largest gut microflora interpretation platforms in the world. At Sun Genomics, we believe that before we can advance the market, we must first advance the science.
